thread.title: John Oliver details all the ways Samsung products will probably ruin your life
thread.title_full: John Oliver details all the ways Samsung products will probably ruin your life

author: Jack Morse
title: John Oliver details all the ways Samsung products will probably ruin your life
text:
South Korean manufacturer Samsung makes a wide assortment of electronics: TVs, washing machines and cellphones are just a few. Unfortunately for their customers, as John Oliver was quick to point out on Sunday night's episode of Last Week Tonight , those products have all run into a bit of, well, trouble .
Everyone knows about the exploding Galaxy Note7 phones and subsequent recall, but are you aware that Samsung also recalled 2.8 million washing machines due to — get this — explosions?
Yup, exploding washing machines.
And that was all before the latest revelation from WikiLeaks alleging that the CIA has turned Samsung smart TVs into covert listening devices .
Oliver gives Samsung the chance to come clean about the various dangers allegedly posed by their products, and the resulting (fake) company video is quite a thing to behold. Not even the fitness tracker comes out unscathed.
Basically, there's a lot of fire.
